messages.body: I'm getting a 404 error when trying to access my course materials

Hello,

I apologize for the inconvenience you're experiencing with accessing your course materials. I've checked your account and can see that your purchase is active. Sometimes this error can occur due to browser caching issues. Could you try clearing your browser cache and cookies, then logging out and back in?

If the problem persists, I can generate a new access link for you. Just let me know if you'd like me to do that.

Best regards,
Alex
